name: FlipTheGun
description:
A game that i was working on ofcource its not an original idea but..

Flip the gun is an interesting funny game you have to shot to the right way to prevent falling the gun

Very easy to play Fly the Gun flip game. Just touch the screen and shoot at the right angle so that your weapon will fly up! Each weapon has a limited number of bullets (shots). So you have to reach collectable bullets in the weapon flip game to make full of your bullet stock by flip the gun. Avoid obstacles so as not to fall. Up signs allow you to fly up much faster. Fly up the flippy gun to collect coins and to unlock all the guns in the Fly the Gun shooting game!

 feature bullets :

• - Perfect time to flip

• - More challenges

• - More Weapon Types

• - Special way to flip

• - Easy control

• - Unlock higher-tier guns

Note:

This is really important if you want to grab this game ,you have to know that i didnt test the game in real time at all 

i don't have a phone so yea i know that's weird but that's what it is ..so please if you notice anything weird in the game tell me to fix it
